name: Patboy
description:
Patboy is platformer game where you explore 3 chapters in 15 levels full of tricky opstacles , enemies and items that you need to avoid.By colecting the key you move to the next level!

A - move left
D - move right

Space - jump/doubleJump/wallJump

Arrow down - speedUp

Exit Sign - exit main menu/pause

Key - go to new level
